review: This is a nice video streamer but I suggest spending the extra to get the Roku 2. The processor is smaller and at times it takes a while to react when trying to change shows. Also, prepare for a long set up. The stick needed a ton of updates out of the box. Probably took 2 hours before anything could be watched.
author: Matt Clifford

review: Have had some minor issues with connectivity and streaming speed while playing...but might be problem other than the device.

review: I love my new Roku. I have one of the older Roku and it's a little cumbersome. My new Roku stick is barely visible. I'm impressed that it does the same job as the larger Roku. Definitely recommending this to friends and family.

review: Have two of these work great. Love the ability to get power from the TV so truely cordless.
